Posts.EditableText: I've been wondering about how I can improve Quest Centre. There's nothing on it at the moment, as I've been debating whether or not to wait until Quest 4 is released. However, the site itself still operates in a very basic fashion, which isn't a problem that much. But if you think there are ways I can improve the functionality of the website, or by adding new ideas to the site, then please suggestion some in this forum or by vising our community forums at http://www.quest.chronicalgames.com Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
I've been wondering about how I can improve Quest Centre. There's nothing on it at the moment, as I've been debating whether or not to wait until Quest 4 is released.

However, the site itself still operates in a very basic fashion, which isn't a problem that much. But if you think there are ways I can improve the functionality of the website, or by adding new ideas to the site, then please suggestion some in this forum or by vising our community forums at http://www.quest.chronicalgames.com

Thanks.
